item.title: How to compile your c/c++ coded game to WebAssembly with Emscripten
item.description: Indroduction Sharing your C++ games online can be tricky since web browsers can’t run them directly. But fear not!We have a solution: WebAssembly. WebAssembly(or WASM for short) lets us convert C++ code into a format that browesers understand. This means your games can now run smoothly right inside a web page. In this blog , we’ll use Emscripten to convert C++ code into WebAssembly to showcase your C++ games online.
